pros: Stands out for its headphone wire system
Features multiple interior and exterior pockets
Breathable material keeps you cool in hot weather

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I have been riding for 40 years and have owned dozens of riding jackets. This one is my all time favorite and it is a stellar value. I am 6'1" 185 and the large fits perfectly. Love the zip out lining. I should be able to wear it in the winter with the lining zipped in and be comfortable. Down here on the coast it gets blistering hot and humid. I wore it for a 20o mile ride the other day and the temps were in the 90's. It was comfortable and the mesh is very effective. This is no lightweight jacket and is very substantial with padding and armor in the right places. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Burton

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is very big
customer_reviews.text: This jacket offers good protection and is great for all seasons with the removable liner. The one thing that gets me is the sizing. I'm 6'0, 185 lbs and a large fits me like a parachute. It's very large and the picture is deceiving as it is nowhere near fitted or slim fit. The CE protection is great, but rendered useless with the amount of movement due to the size issues. Overall, if they could get the sizing right, this product could compete with the likes of products from say Alpinestars.
customer_reviews.author: Blumski33

customer_reviews.title: Consider buying a size up
customer_reviews.text: For a normal jacket the first I ordered was the right size. The sleeves were too short, especially when I put my arms out in a riding position. Because of that I went with an XL (I'm normally an L) and that was much better. W/o the interior liner it's great for the Florida heat. Cool when riding and a bit warm when standing still, but that's expected of a black jacket in Florida. Sub 70° it gets pretty cold without the interior liner. Great jacket
customer_reviews.author: James A

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: If it's your plan to beat the heat with this mesh riding jacket, look elsewhere. All the extra pockets cover most of the mesh. Shortly after I purchased this jacket the removable liner came apart in one of the sleeves. I reached out to Vicking both by email and phone message to see if I could get that part replaced. Nada response ... nothing. I'm 6'2" and it is pretty short all around just as an added note.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Thomas Photography

customer_reviews.title: For the price there isn't a single negative thing I ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price there isn't a single negative thing I could find for this jacket. I am 6'1, 175lb. tall and slender most would say, and I ordered a large. This jacket has the ability to conform to really any body type with the amount of adjusting straps and buckles. It has pockets for days on end, and the mesh outer material gives it the ability to breathe while riding, so ideally its meant for warmer climates. I wouldn't wear it any temperature below 55, because even then that'd be a chilly ride. At the end of the day, this jacket is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: j_pozzi

customer_reviews.title: It would be a good deal if....
customer_reviews.text: I received a brand new jacket in plastic... Upon opening it I noticed that there is a hole ripped in the mesh about the size of a quarter above the Viking rubber patch on the sleeve! Overall the jacket fits good and the quality is damn good for the price.... Just not sure about their QA. I am not sure if I am going to keep it and sew a patch over it or go through the hassle of exchanging it for a new one. The armor that comes in the sleeves and shoulders is ok, I am definitely replacing it with a higher quality because the shoulder armor sits on my back, I have broad shoulders though.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Feels top and very adjustable
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Feels top and very adjustable. Warm for 50 degree weather on bike. Good padding. Not sure how it will survive after a nasty slide, I believe at that point it would be time for another jacket but it also feels like it will do its job. It has a weird odor to it when you first get it out of bag. A chemical smell but it didn't bother me. Over all I'd purchase another jacket from viking cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Semiera

customer_reviews.title: Bot bad, but still worth it
customer_reviews.text: The jacket is not weather proof; as in if its raining, your getting soaked. As advertised you can take the inner liner out so that your cooler, but the "vents" are just mesh; so that means they are always open. So even if you are wearing the liner water is still coming in. The cuffs are little small also. All things considered its not a bad jacket. yeah its not water jacket, but I don't intend to rife untiejacket; so no big deal I guess.
customer_reviews.author: beatle

customer_reviews.title: saved sons life
customer_reviews.text: my son wore this and the first few trips wearing I was happy for his protection. he got hit by a car and lost his spleen- if not for this jacket and his helmet he would dead. the hospital says every day they get someone from motorcycle accident in ER.
customer_reviews.author: tom beck

customer_reviews.title: Best mesh jacket on the market.
customer_reviews.text: The Viking Cycle Warlock Motorcycle Jacket exceeded my expectations. This jacket fits so perfectly and feels amazing when I'm riding. The pads in the front, back, shoulders, and elbows make this jacket look and feel like a champion. It is perfect for those chilly but not too cold days. There's a removable liner also that helps with temperature adjustment. The SureFit adjustment system makes the jacket fit even better. When it fits right, I feel safer while riding. I don't have to adjust and readjust while riding. This jacket is a must have for everyone on a motorcycle. Thanks so much Viking Cycle for making great products.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend and he loved it! It has multiple pockets inside and out. I liked that it has chest padding for more protection. The shipping was very quick and came in in one piece. The quality was outstanding and loved the design. It also has a removable liner for cold weather. It's also very breathable, which makes it even better in hot weather. Overall, loved the jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Via

customer_reviews.title: High quality product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality product that anyone would be happy to have! I was very impressed with the level of protection along with the comfort the jacket gives. There are also several pockets which make it easier to carry additional items or relieve room in pant pockets which can make you feel crowded when riding. I wore the jocket during mid 50 temperatures with the inner liner. It performed well at blocking the cold air. I highly recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Bryson Seth Nesbitt

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality of the build of the jacket for the price, armor is comfortable in the packet shell, it doesn’t move around, plent or pockets with good access to them. I will be returning it to get one sizes bigger but I’m truly excited to wear it when riding since I was in dire need for a new one! I can’t wait to wear it on the road
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Honda

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It's very breathable when you're moving, although the black is still hot when you're stopped in the sun (beats leather, though). Feels comfortable and reasonably protected with the armor in there, although I haven't wrecked yet, so who knows. Tons of pockets. Seems like it's well-made; a good value.
customer_reviews.author: PghNeuro

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Jacket is very well made and has good flexibility . I should get a gift card from seller ! already three of the guys I ride with bought same ! Good gear and price . Same is more than double at bike shops in Austin TX.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, the protection is nice and my husband says it feels great and moves with him. Only downside is bugs will get stuck in the mesh and can be a little difficult to clean sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Savanah Rose Delorit

customer_reviews.title: Great product very comfortable in 90 degree weather
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality a lot fits a little tight but I’m 5’7 and weigh 190 and got the large. I can lose a few pounds and it’ll fit better. Love it no complaints from their end best jacket you can get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alanusmc

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh
customer_reviews.text: This jacket was a little large compared to others. I’ve had multiple riding jackets and every large fits me well. This one was a little large. The padding is sub par as well. And there are multiple corners where the fabric/stitching meets inside the jacket that come to a point and scratches me. It’s not that bad over all, but spend a little extra money and get wayyyy better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Percival

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket. Fits just right and has great ventilation with the liner out for summer riding.
customer_reviews.author: Hall Mark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacked. I'm 6'3" 200 lbs and the large fits perfect. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Oak

customer_reviews.title: Great riding jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Great material and well made. Came very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it at the beginning of the season and worked perfectly, awesome quality for the price. Tons of pockets for any items you may need or riding configuration you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: James Hall

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing and fits perfectly! Im a 5ft 9in 177lb guy and the large did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Oversized!
customer_reviews.text: The jacket seemed nice enough but I think they run large. All of my motorcycle jackets are large but this large was family baggy on me. This type of jacket is supposed to fit closer to the body. Seems like it was made pretty well thought. I may order another but this time in medium.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit, comfort and price
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable jacket. Its armored but surprisingly not bulky or stiff. The jacket let's you move with ease. It has a removable liner which is great and plenty of pocket space. I have another jacket that's twice the price and nowhere near as versatile as this jacket. I'd put this up against any other mesh jacket out there
customer_reviews.author: Leonel Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this jacket better than my $180 Joe rocket. Large fits perfect for 6 foot, 185 athletic frame. Very nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Dell231

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jacket for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket for the price. The mesh vents allows the wind to cool me down as I ride in the miserable Arizona heat. There are pads placed throughout the jacket and zippered pockets everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool mesh jacket
customer_reviews.text: Cool mesh jacket. Fits snug and padding feels good. No good in cool weather as it offers NO warmth even with the liner. Made in Pakistan.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick NYC83

customer_reviews.title: bulkier than what it looks like in the pictures
customer_reviews.text: the sizing is correct but it is bulkier than what it looks like in the picture. after testing it i will update the review
customer_reviews.author: stephane

customer_reviews.title: It's really nice but the stomach area is huge
customer_reviews.text: It's really nice but the stomach area is huge. It's not very fitted at all. The Velcro on the back to make that area tighter only reaches so far. Might get more Velcro to make it tighter.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Warsi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality jacket, medium quality in warmth on cold nights, more geared towards moderate weather!!
customer_reviews.author: Chas71

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and great price for that quality. Make sure you follow their measuring chart. Definitely a buy if you are looking to save some cash.
customer_reviews.author: Haris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Great price point, perfect for summer or if cooler has a lining with it. Quality is on par with my more expensive jackets. Fits great, sizing chart was spot on for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting Jacket. Breathable material and very well constructed. I will continue to purchase items from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Pennings

customer_reviews.title: makes you look like the model!
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and as expected. warm with the liner in, cool with the liner out. perfect application. really like the pockets!
customer_reviews.author: geoffb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, great communication, awesome jacket especially for the price! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made jacket for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made. Comfortable with lots of pockets. Has reflective material as well. Happy with the purchase. Good jacket for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brown

customer_reviews.title: Armor is upgradeable!
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is awesome! I go 5'10 at 215 pounds burley and it fit me exactly the way i hoped. Very comfortable. Good material. The armor inserts for shoulders elbows and forearms are pocketed and upgradeable. I am very impressed with its quality and price point. Viking Cycles.is definitley a company to keep your eye on!.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: it is very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I received my jacket, it is very nice for the price. Kept warm in cold weather, had enough pockets for phone, wallet, etc. Over all quality is great, only negative ate the pockets, they are not woven cloth material, they are plastic. Thats the only downside. But, i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket, cool style. Difficult to fit a tall skinny guy with broad shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Runs true to US sizing.
customer_reviews.text: True to size. Ordered Large for husband, who is a M shirt, and it’s a bit big. (6’/185lbs) Overall great jacket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Really like All the pockets
customer_reviews.text: Really like All the pockets, breaths very well on warm days even sitting in traffic. I usually wear an XL or even 2x with most jackets but the large fit me perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: It fits real good ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent product , I have no complains about I still use it every summer since I bought it .. it looks really nice and fits perfectly... definitely would recommend...
customer_reviews.author: artemiso vaz

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME jacket!!!
customer_reviews.text: Jacket fit true to size and the style is excellent! I love all the pockets and the armor. It's not to restrictive of movement. Nice and breathable so it's nice in warmer weather as well as in the cold! I give the jacket an A+! GREAT job Viking Cycles!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Andree

customer_reviews.title: 10 out 10 recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was a perfect fit and had a very tough and durable material. The built in padding is the perfect thickness between safety and comfort for a bike jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Tobias B

customer_reviews.title: nice and warm with liner
customer_reviews.text: Product preforms as designed, nice and warm with liner, nice and breezy without.
customer_reviews.author: zach sonker

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically and functionally pleasing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing features, this jacket is a good conversation starter on looks alone.
customer_reviews.author: William Sheffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice so far.  Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket so far. Have had it about a week. Let me say first off this is my first jacket and I'm a new rider. I bought a large, I am 5'10 170 and it fits descent I have long arms so mediums tend to be short on the arms. I think the large is good for me but I am on the low end of weight for the large. The billion pockets are great the unzippable liner is nice. My only complaint this far is that I thought this was a warm weather jacket and at 75 degrees I'm still pretty warm in it if I'm under 30mph or stopped for a bit. More update in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dale H

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very durable and great looks, very fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Shane stader

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Invest in More
customer_reviews.text: Loved this jacket for just over 8 months... UNTIL THE ZIPPER BROKE! The jacket itself is fine, a little short (I'm 6'2"), but after maybe only 20 uses, the cheap zipper broke. Really disappointed, as the company would not offer me a replacement. Do yourself a favor and invest in something more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The protection is amazing and it breathes really well
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is well worth the money. The protection is amazing and it breathes really well. I like the look, too. Amazing purchase. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: This item was a X-mas gift for husband. He LOVED it!!! We both were very impressed with the style and overall design. Looking at this jacket you would think it cost more than the price listed.
customer_reviews.author: Jayla Blu

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive riding jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described. Fits well. Function did far is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Jacket came in excellent condition and in reasonable time. Better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.author: James Han

customer_reviews.title: Great year round jacket with tons of pockets
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with it. It's a little wide on the top section but it gives room for other clothing underneath. Definitely love all the convenient pockets and the breathing fabric. The fact that the inside layer is removable also is a big advantage for year round use. the Fabric looks high quality. The only down side is that the zipper is a little hard to zip on and the collar kinda rubs against your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Francois M. Dermu

customer_reviews.title: yaaaaasss
customer_reviews.text: Great protective gear, stays pretty cool when The liner is out, has the word viking in the title, the sizes run very acurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Reid

customer_reviews.title: If you take the liner out the jacket is probably as cool as can be expected in 95 degree heat and ...
customer_reviews.text: The jacket fits as advertised, the armor is a high density foam product. If you take the liner out the jacket is probably as cool as can be expected in 95 degree heat and high humidity. There is a slight hitch with the zipper on my jacket, you have to pull one of the sides up slightly to get the zipper to align, this is a very minor issue and the only one I have with the Jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This jackets has a great riding fit and breathes very well. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Steffan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy zaldivar

customer_reviews.title: Great product, came in on time
customer_reviews.text: Great product, came in on time. Seems to run a little small but love the padding and still breathable. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Evin Weekley

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket. Comfortable for riding and clocks wind pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Great jacket. Comfortable for riding and clocks wind pretty well while still breathing. Plenty of pockets both inside and out and all of them have zippers which is nice. The only thing I wish this jacket had was zippered venting on the outside of the jacket for riding on the warmer summer days. But as I mentioned before it still breathes pretty well so it's not a huge deal. Great jacket all around especially for the price. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

product_meta.title: Viking Cycle Textile Warlock Mesh Motorcycle Jacket for Men – Removable Armor, Summer Riding Gear – Reflective, Breathable, and Water Repellent
feature_bullets: ✅ BREATHABLE & INNER LINER: The Viking Cycle Warlock motorcycle jacket has a cooling mesh shell that improves airflow and will keep you cool in Spring,Summer, and keeps body warm during Fall, Winter with quilted inner lining.

✅ CE APPROVED PROTECTION: For the safety of customers, Viking Cycle has included chest and spine pads with a pocket for additional spine protection. Other added protection includes vital areas such as removable elbow and shoulder armor. All of the protection and armor is C.E approved. The front and back of the jacket uses 3M Reflective piping material to keep you highly visible at all times.

✅ MULTI-POCKET: Be ready for whatever the road throws at you with 2 zippered external and multiple internal pockets for personal items. Keep your valued belongings in the hidden pocket, while listening to your phone or other media player from a dedicated pocket and headphone wire system.

✅ FUNCTIONAL & COMFORTABLE: This is one of Viking Cycle’s most stylish motorcycle jackets with your comfort and style assured. The cuffs and waist have a custom adjustable Velcro straps that gives the desired fit. The adjustability of this cruising jacket provides maximum mobility so you can focus on the road and ride comfortably.

✅ AFFORDABLE QUALITY: We manufacture our jackets with the highest quality materials at an affordable price. Try our jackets without worry because you will notice the quality of workmanship and ride in style.
